name: Only Once You Live (ACour008)
description:
ONLY ONCE YOU LIVE
v. 2.0.10
Source Code: https://github.com/ACour008/gamehighedjam

Our boxy hero finds himself in a dark underground city of platforms, seemingly ruled by a weird box-devil who calls himself the Magnificent Malfeesio. Can you jump to Malfeesio's challenge and guide our boxy hero through the the mysterious concrete platform jungle? Did we also mention our hero is a box?

Notes:

Best resolution is 1280x720 px. If the game is too large for your window, please try zooming the page out to about 50-75%. Builds with smaller resolutions may be forthcoming.

New Features

  • Player handling is smoother.  Controlling the character is easier than before with a nicer feel to the jump mechanism. Double jumping is also fun.
  • Platform & Obstacle Redesign: Platforms are now larger to help you time your jumps. The obstacles thrown at the player add more of a challenge when jumping from platform to platform.
  • Scoring. The longer you live, the better you score. You can now challenge yourself and friends to see who can get a higher score.
  • New Tutorial: For new players, a quick tutorial is added so everyone knows what buttons to push. **Spoiler Alert: Its the Space bar.
  • Bigger mustaches, more often. Our boxy hero's mustache is bushier than ever & makes an appearance 70% more often than previous versions!

Known Issues:

  • There are always bugs in any software. If you find any, please let me know.
